description: This file defines a module for making API HTTP requests using fetch. It includes helper functions to build URLs with query parameters and a main exported function `apiRequest` that performs fetch calls with JSON handling, error management, and support for different HTTP methods, headers, and request bodies.

methods.name: buildUrl(path, query)
methods.description: Internal function to construct a URL string with the base URL and appended query parameters.

methods.name: apiRequest(path, { method = 'GET', query, headers, body } = {})
methods.description: Main exported function to perform an API request with customizable options, handling JSON serialization and response parsing, including error handling for network errors and non-2xx responses.

ctags.name: apiRequest
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiRequest(path, { method = 'GET', query, headers, body } = {}) {$/
